SYSTEM: PresntacionMLF-vFinal.pdf: Página 19
Initial and Future Work with the Easy-to-Read Methodology 
Understanding How the Easy-To-Read Methodology is used 
The process of adapting a particular material to be 
compliant to E2R guidelines is cyclic 
Three key activities are performed as part of a cyclic process 
 
 
 
 
 
 
When the two first activities (analysis and transformation) 
are exhaustive and meticulous, the difficulty in the 
validation process decreases considerably   
 
31
